    St. David's Episcopal Church.

    GET STARTED!

Café Divine

Cafe Divine is run by Chef Ray Trono and is a part of St. David’s Episcopal Church. Every Thursday Café Divine is open to the public serving a hearty lunch from 11:30 a.m. to 1 p.m. Enjoy a casual setting, convenient location and plenty of good food.

Chef Ray Trono is a graduate from the Culinary Institute of America. Chef Ray oversees all aspects of the Cafe Divine Food Ministry which is dedicated to serving fabulous food to St. David’s parishioners, the downtown community, and all those who host events at St. David’s Church.

LOCATION

Café Divine is located inside St. David’s Episcopal Church on the 3rd floor, 301 E. 8th Street at San Jacinto. See our directions page for a map.

CAFE DIVINE MEAL SERVICE AND HOURS:

Sunday Breakfast: 8:30 – 11 a.m.
Wednesday Dinner: 5:30 – 6:45 p.m.
Thursday Lunch: 11:30 a.m. – 1 p.m.

Thursday Lunch

$9 Dine-in, $9.50 Take-out

A La Carte Pricing
Entrées: $5
Sides: $1 each
Side Salads: $2
Desserts: $2  each

August 11, 2016

Entrees
Cobb Salad
Smoked Brisket, Chicken, and Sausage
Stacked Eggplant (vegetarian)

Sides
Pinto Beans
Potato Salad
Coleslaw

Johnson’s Backyard Garden Salad ($2)
Ingredients are locally grown and organic.

Dessert Choices
Coconuet Chess Pielets
Turtle Cheese Cake
Cherry Fudge Cake

* Entree salads come with dessert (no sides).
All meals served with tea, coffee, water and bread.

Want to preview Thursday’s lunch menu? Subscribe to our weekly menu email. You will be prompted to check the Thursday Lunch menu list.

Wednesday Dinner

$7 Dine-in, $7.50 Take-out
Wednesday night dinner is served from 5 – 6:45 p.m.

August 10

Garden Salad
Fruit Salad
Chicken, Shrimp, and Sausage Jambalaya Mac
Veggie Enchiladas
Roasted Veggies
Yukon Gold Mashed Potatoes
Gazpacho
Assorted Desserts

CAKES FOR SALE!

Chef Ray is now selling his classic cakes that have become so popular.

  • Chocolate Raspberry ($20)
  • Classic Rum ($20)
  • Chocolate Toffee Bundt with Espresso Icing ($20)
  • Chocolate Pecan Pie ($15)
  • Lemon Poppy Seed ($15)

To order, contact Chef Ray.
